caption:
The photograph is a close-up portrait of a sheep. The image focuses on the sheep's head, showcasing its textured wool which appears soft and dense. The sheep's eye is slightly visible, conveying a calm and gentle demeanor. The eye is partially covered by the wool, further emphasizing the thickness and fluffiness of the fleece.

The sheep's skin visible around the eye area looks clean and smooth. The photograph captures fine details such as individual strands of wool and slight discolorations on the skin, likely natural pigmentation. The overall color palette is predominantly natural tones of white and beige, with the light illuminating the textures of the wool, giving it a soft glow. The background is blurred, ensuring the focus remains solely on the sheep, highlighting its peaceful expression and dense fleece.
title: Closeup of a sheep's head on a ranch near Leakey, Texas, and San Antonio
